import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './booking.css'; import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from "reactstrap"; import { use } from 'react'; const Booking = ({ tour, avgRating }) => { const { price, reviews } = tour; const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userId: '01', userEmail: 'example@gmail.com', fullname: '', phone: '', bookAt: '', guestSize: '1' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]: e.target.value })) }; const serviceFee = 10000; const totalAmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number(serviceFee); const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(credentials); }; return (

{price} vnđ / mỗi người

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews.length})

{/* Booking end */} {/* Booking bottom */}

) } export default Booking
